sentence.Network_en: The attentions of the media reduced her to tears.
sentence.Network_cn: 媒体的关注把她弄哭了。

sentence.Network_en: Some men are flattered by the attentions of a young woman.
sentence.Network_cn: 年轻女性的倾心会使一些男人飘飘然起来。

sentence.Network_en: They showed the old lady numerous little attentions at the tea party.
sentence.Network_cn: 在茶话会上他们对那位老太太百般殷勤.

list.abs: 选择性注意（selective attention）是指在外界诸多刺激中仅仅注意到某些刺激或刺激的某些方面，而忽略了其他刺激。编辑本段作用  …
注意广度如图所示，横坐标6上的红线代表着人类平均注意广度（attention span）。我们注意到在5.5的位置上函数曲线几乎是看不见 …
在注意力经济(attention economy)的时代，面对每天数百万计的信息更新量以及数十亿计的网络页面“轰炸”着我们这个时代，我们应该 …

entry.def: If you give someone or something your attention, you look at it, listen to it, or think about it carefully.

example.ex: Later he turned his attention to the desperate state of housing in the province.
example.tran: 其后，他将注意力转向了该省形势严峻的住房问题。

entry.def: Attention is great interest that is shown in someone or something, particularly by the general public.

example.ex: Volume Two, subtitled 'The Lawyers', will also attract considerable attention...
example.tran: 副标题为“律师”的第二册也将获得广泛关注。

example.ex: The conference may help to focus attention on the economy.
example.tran: 此次会议可能有助于将关注焦点放在经济上。

entry.def: If someone or something is getting attention, they are being dealt with or cared for.

example.ex: Each year more than two million household injuries need medical attention.
example.tran: 每年有超过200万起家中受伤事件需要医疗处理。

example.ex: ...a demanding baby who seems to want attention 24 hours a day.
example.tran: 好像一天24小时都要人照看的难缠的宝宝

entry.def: You can refer to someone's efforts to help you, or the interest they show in you, as their attentions, especially if you dislike or disapprove of them.

example.ex: The only way to escape the unwanted attentions of the local men was not to go out...
example.tran: 避免被当地人指指点点的唯一办法就是闭门不出。

example.ex: The meeting was held away from the attentions of the media...
example.tran: 会议的举行避开了媒体的关注。

entry.def: If you bring something to someone's attention or draw their attention to it, you tell them about it or make them notice it.

example.ex: If we don't keep bringing this to the attention of the people, nothing will be done...
example.tran: 如果我们无法让群众一直关注此事，那将一事无成。

example.ex: We conclude by drawing attention to the issues around which the debate should focus.
example.tran: 我们作总结时着重提到了辩论应该关注的一些问题。

entry.def: If someone or something attracts your attention or catches your attention, you suddenly notice them.

example.ex: A faint aroma of coffee attracted his attention...
example.tran: 淡淡的咖啡香味一下子吸引了他。

example.ex: He sat at one of the round tables and tried to attract her attention.
example.tran: 他坐在其中一张圆桌旁边，想引起她的注意。

entry.tran: 关心/不关心；注意/不注意
entry.def: If you pay attention to someone, you watch them, listen to them, or take notice of them. If you pay no attention to someone, you behave as if you are not aware of them or as if they are not important.

example.ex: More than ever before, the food industry is paying attention to young consumers...
example.tran: 食品工业比以往任何时候都更加关注年轻消费者。

example.ex: Other people walk along the beach at night, so I didn't pay any attention at first...
example.tran: 入夜后还有人在沙滩上散步，起先我并没注意到。

entry.def: When people stand to attention or stand at attention, they stand straight with their feet together and their arms at their sides.

example.ex: Soldiers in full combat gear stood at attention...
example.tran: 全副武装的士兵们立正站着。

example.ex: The waiters stood to attention with napkins folded over their arms.
example.tran: 服务员笔直站立着，餐巾折叠着放在他们的手臂上。

auth_sentence.content: The Crookes better hold attentions when they slow down.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Crookes better hold attentions when they slow down.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Crookes better hold attentions when they slow down.

auth_sentence.content: His attentions to Nureyev remained undiminished, however.
auth_sentence.res_content: His attentions to Nureyev remained undiminished, however.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His attentions to Nureyev remained undiminished, however.

auth_sentence.content: Those buying habits are catching the attentions of major consumer companies.
auth_sentence.res_content: Those buying habits are catching the attentions of major consumer companies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Those buying habits are catching the attentions of major consumer companies.
